mapper.sql: ID , JOB_TYPE, RIGHT_TYPE, WORKS_TYPE, USER_TYPE, RIGHT_NAME, RIGHT_PERSON, HANDLE_PERSON, AUDIT_STATE, RIGHT_ID, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED
mapper.select: select count(*) from right_work_info
select count(*) from right_work_info where audit_state = #{state}
select count(*) from right_work_info where job_type = #{jobType}
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_type = #{rightType}
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_name like "%"#{rightName}"%"
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_name like "%"#{rightName}"%" and audit_state=#{state}
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_person like "%"#{rightPerson}"%"
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_person like "%"#{rightPerson}"%" and audit_state=#{state}
select count(*) from right_work_info where handle_person like "%"#{handlePerson}"%"
select count(*) from right_work_info where handle_person like "%"#{handlePerson}"%" and audit_state=#{state}
select count(*) from right_work_info where user_type = #{userType}
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_id = #{rightId}
select count(*) from right_work_info where auditor_id = #{mId} and audit_state in ("通过", "驳回", "关闭")
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_name like "%"#{rightName}"%" and auditor_id=#{mId} and audit_state in ("通过" ,"驳回" ,"关闭")
select count(*) from right_work_info where right_person like "%"#{rightPerson}"%" and auditor_id=#{mId} and audit_state in ("通过" ,"驳回" ,"关闭")
select count(*) from right_work_info where handle_person like "%"#{handlePerson}"%" and auditor_id=#{mId} and audit_state in ("通过" ,"驳回" ,"关闭")
